name: o (Kangasaur)
description:
o is a minimal tower defense game made in Processing in 2020, originally made in two weeks for the midterm in Matt Parker's Intro to Programming for Games class. Place towers around o in the center of your screen to protect it through 10 progressively more difficult waves.

Now includes an original soundtrack by Hunter Colon (IKJ Leio)! Check out more of his work here!

Coming soon: o deluxe edition! An updated version in Unity, with more waves, more towers, more enemies, more o. Please look forward to it!
